oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter and memoir of Carson Reed Orr's experience in the Civil War, written by his brother C. J. Orr
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "War history of Carson Reed Orr who enlisted in Co. H, 3rd (Clack's) Tennessee Infantry Regiment, commanded by C. H. Walker." Brief memoir and letter written in 1916 by his brother C. J. Orr to his son, Billie Mack Orr. Both brothers, Carson R. Orr and C. J. Orr, were in Co. H, 3rd Tenn. (Clack's) Inf. The memoir gives info about engagements fought by the Army of Tennessee from Fort Donelson to Bentonville, NC.
